hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Ganon's trials# protect the way to #Morpha#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Bow#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the path of #time#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Blue Rupee#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Zora's River# is a foolish choice.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##the Shadow Temple## has #0# major items.

GC (Maze).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (20 pieces)#.

GV (Waterfall).text: If Gorons eat rocks, does that mean I'm in danger?

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Invisible Chest

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: Open your eyes.^Open your eyes.^Wake up, @.
